Wisdom: لَيْسَ فِي الْجَوَارِحِ أَقَلُّ شُكْراً مِنَ الْعَيْنِ فَلَا تُعْطُوهَا سُؤْلَهَا فَتَشْغَلَكُمْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: There is no part of the body that is less thankful than the eye, so do not give it what it seeks thereby letting it occupy you from the remembrance of Allah

Wisdom: لَيْسَ فِي الْمَعَاصِي أَشَدُّ مِنِ اتِّبَاعِ الشَّهْوَةِ فَلَا تُطِيعُوهَا فَيَشْغَلَكُمْ عَنْ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: There is no sin that is worse than following [one’s] lust, so do not obey it as it will preoccupy you from [the remembrance of] Allah
Whoever forgets Allah, He makes him forget himself

Wisdom: مَنِ اشْتَغَلَ بِذِكْرِ النَّاسِ قَطَعَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَنْ ذِكْرِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever is preoccupied in remembering the people, Allah, the Glorified, cuts him off from His remembrance

Wisdom: مَنْ نَسِيَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَنْسَاهُ اللَّهُ نَفْسَهُ وَأَعْمَى قَلْبَهُ
enWisdom: One who forgets [Allah,] the Glorified, Allah makes him forget himself and blinds his heart
